mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(category_id, name, password, title, content) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT category_id AS categoryId, category_name AS categoryName FROM category

SELECT post.post_id AS postId, category.category_name AS category, post.name, post.title, post.view_count AS viewCount, DATE_FORMAT(post.create_date, '%Y%.%m%.%d% %h%:%i') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(post.update_date, '%Y%.%m%.%d% %h%:%i') AS updateDate FROM post post JOIN category category ON post.category_id = category.category_id

SELECT post.post_id AS postId, category.category_name AS category, post.name, post.title, post.content, post.view_count AS viewCount, DATE_FORMAT(post.create_date, '%Y%.%m%.%d% %h%:%i') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(post.update_date, '%Y%.%m%.%d% %h%:%i') AS updateDate FROM post post JOIN category category ON post.category_id = category.category_id WHERE post.post_id = #{postId}
SELECT comment.content, DATE_FORMAT(comment.create_date, '%Y%.%m%.%d% %h%:%i') AS createDate FROM comment comment WHERE comment.post_id = #{postId}
